remarks: Incomparability under a strict weak partial order is an equivalence relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:

swoer.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X /\ z e. X ) ) -> ( x .< y -> ( x .< z \/ z .< y ) ) ) $.
